name: RN apps: Post a file attachment

customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Post a file attachment
————————————————————————————
  1. Navigate to the channel you want to upload the file in
  2. Tap the icon to attach a file or the icon to attach an image (not the camera icon, but you can select a photo file if you like)
inline.expectedResult: • File selection on your device should open

inline.description:
1. Select a file to upload
  2. Observe the loading indicator (if it doesn't upload immediately)
inline.expectedResult: • The file should start uploading, loading indicator displays if needed, and then a preview should be displayed

inline.description: 1. Type a message (if desired) and tap the aeroplane icon to send.
inline.expectedResult: • Message and file attachment should be posted.
